description.value:
Level 9 Transmutation

Casting Time: 1 action

Range: undefined self

Components: V, S, M

Duration: Concentration, up to 1 hour

You shape-shift into another creature for the duration or until you take a Magic|XPHB action to shape-shift into a different eligible form. The new form must be of a creature that has a Challenge Rating|XPHB no higher than your level or Challenge Rating|XPHB. You must have seen the sort of creature before, and it can't be a Construct or an Undead. When you cast the spell, you gain a number of Temporary Hit Points|XPHB equal to the Hit Points|XPHB of the first form into which you shape-shift. These Temporary Hit Points|XPHB vanish if any remain when the spell ends. Your game statistics are replaced by the stat block of the chosen form, but you retain your creature type; alignment; personality; Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma scores; Hit Points|XPHB; Hit Point Dice|XPHB; proficiencies; and ability to communicate. If you have the Spellcasting feature, you retain it too. Upon shape-shifting, you determine whether your equipment drops to the ground or changes in size and shape to fit the new form while you're in it.

If you have the Spellcasting feature, you retain it too.
Upon shape-shifting, you determine whether your equipment drops to the ground or changes in size and shape to fit the new form while you're in it.
